blin_OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueCurrentNet

Amount of net required minimum rental payments for operating leases having an initial or remaining non-cancelable lease term in excess of one year due in the next fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

blin_OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueInFourYearsNet
